content.title: Tile Editor
content.tagline: A tile-based editor for old-school, psx tacticals.

content.paragraph: I created a tile-based level editor for 3D tactical games in Unity. This tool allows users to place tiles, or voxels, in different shapes, including flat and sloped options, and at various elevations. Users can also add obstacles and enemies to the environment, enabling the creation of functional and strategic game levels. The editor streamlines the level design process, making it easier for developers to build engaging gameplay experiences.

content.legend: The preview shows the level while a 2D grid allow to precisely place the elements on the map.
